channel.title: NPC with multiple teleportation options
channel.description:
Okay, so I added the dialogue and actionhandler. When I try and make it actually teleport on clickingbuttons it won't compile. I've tried many different codes but it just won't work. I'm using Second Reality [PI] base for anyone that cares. http://img89.imageshack.us/img89/4569/telen.png
Thanks in advance. :)
